info.title: Domain Suggestions TLDs
info.description: Return 100s of relevant domain name suggestions + related TLDs, ordered by relevance. Many of them will be available and valuable. You can choose which TLDs to use, promote, or demote. Use our other API suite to "manage your account" to configure your site preferences (coming soon). Also see our "Domain Availability Bulk" API "https://rapidapi.com/besta-domains/api/domain-availability-bulk". Please read more at https://besta.domains/api

get.summary: 100s of domain name suggestions + related TLDs

200.description: Returns JSON data. See data.domains for suggestions. They are grouped by type. See data.domains.name for our featured product - new generated phrases from relevant words and TLDs. See related TLDs at data.tlds - ordered by relevance.

get.description: 100s of domain name suggestions + related TLDs. More options (Query Params / POST data) will be added as soon as they are available and tested. Please check back soon. Also see our Availability API (https://rapidapi.com/besta-domains/api/domain-availability-bulk). This is an initial alpha release. More options and features coming soon. All changes will be backward compatible, so feel free to start using. Read more about this API and future improvements at https://besta.domains/api

parameters.name: domain
parameters.description: The domain you are searching for, but is not available. We'll use the name and TLD from this string. We'll parse it, separate real words and brand names, and use this information to find relevant suggestions. TLD can be omitted. We'll assume ".com". Spaces are allowed. Spaces are encouraged! If your visitor types in a phrase with spaces, please do not strip them out! Please leave them.

parameters.name: num_tlds
parameters.description: (optional) (default=30) How many related TLDs should we find, including the ones you specified and ".com"? We return relevant TLDs in data.tlds. However, we also use them in data.domains. So, if you specify a small number, you will also have fewer name suggestions. However, they may be more relevant, because you'd be using only the most relevant TLDs.

parameters.name: use_generic_tlds
parameters.description: (coming soon) (optional) (default=true) Besides related relevant TLDs which we find according to similarity to keywords - we also mix in some generic TLDs to create name suggestions. These are "com", "net", "info", "biz", etc. Set this to falce to disable this.

parameters.name: all_in_one_list
parameters.description: (coming soon) Currently, suggestions are returned in several lists - grouped by type of manipulation. Set this to true, to return all suggestions mixed into one list. We're still deciding the best strategy to mix and sort the different types of suggestions. Please tell us your thoughts: https://besta.domains/contact

requestBody.description: POST data uses same keys/values as Query Params. Please refer to Query Params for descriptions. If using POST request, you may choose to send some variables as POST data, and others as Query Params. If both are sent for the same key, Query Params will be preferred. More options coming soon. To learn more, please see https://besta.domains/api.
